name: Date with Modeus
description:
Do you want to have a lovely date with Modeus? 

Well... In this little Visual Novel game, You can do just that :D

(Keep in mind this is just a DEMO, so most of the stuff is incomplete and/or is out of place as the game is still in development.)

This game is an unofficial fan project of 'HELLTAKER'. It has nothing to do with the original game.

### SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: ###

Windows

  • Version: Windows 7 or higher.
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 1.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100MB of disk space

macOS

  • Version: 10.10+
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • RAM: 1.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 100MB of disk space

Linux

  • Version: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 1.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 100MB of disk space
